naslov: Split, jedinstvena kuća u prvom redu do mora (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Posredujemo pri dugorocnom najmu jedinstvene kuće, prvi red do mora u elitnom dijelu Splita. Kuća se prostire na 88 m2, a ispred se smjestio ogroman vrt raznih vrsta voća i povrća te grijani bazen. Kuća je tlocrtno raspoređena na veliki dnevni boravak sa kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe i kupaonice. U dvorištu se nalazi prostorija za fitness, ostava te natkriveni parking. Do nekretnine vodi put koji pripada nekretnini, što dodatno osigurava privatnost. Najveća prednost ove nekretnine je sama lokacija je je smještena na uzvisini što pruža dodatni mir. Svi najvažniji sadržaji su na par minuta vožnje od lokacije. Ne propustite priliku iznajmiti ovu jedinstvenu nekretninu i uživati u svim njenim prednostima. Za sve dodatno info na KONTAKT: 0915615115 (ŽELJANA) We mediate the long-term rental of a unique house, first row to the sea in an elite part of Split. The house covers an area of ​​88 m2, and in front of it there is a huge garden of various kinds of fruits and vegetables and a heated swimming pool. The floor plan of the house is divided into a large living room with kitchen, two bedrooms and bathrooms. In the yard there is a fitness room, storage room and covered parking. A road belonging to the property leads to the property, which additionally ensures privacy. The biggest advantage of this property is the location itself, which is located on a hill that provides additional peace. All the most important amenities are within a few minutes' drive from the location. Do not miss the opportunity to find this unique property and enjoy all its advantages. For all additional information on CONTACT: 0915615115 (ZELJANA)
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
